control

Class AiControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.AiControl

  • public class AiControl
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to control the computer-players of the game with references to parts of the program the method needs.
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public java.lang.String makeMove(Player player)
        Analyses the players hand and the board to come up with possible moves. If there are no moves it plays a card from the hand to the board. The difficulty of the computer-player determines how "smart" the move will be.
        Parameters:
        player - : the computer-player to make the move for.
        Returns:
        a string describing the move the player did.
